description: black and red with black cord; ebi (crayfish) on each piece; the two case inro has the ebi wrapped around the inro; the ojime is a small version of the inro; circular ebi on inro; separate matching obidome
dimension: a-c (inro): H.2-3/8 x W.3-1/8 in. (overall); d (ojime): H.15/16 x W.1-3/8 in.; e,f (netsuke): Dia.2 in. (overall); g (obidome): H.1-1/8 x W.3-1/4 in.
title: Inro with Lobster Motif en suite
